data.title: Aquila Clean Energy Asia Pacific
data.meta_description: Committed to advancing the energy transition, we fund, develop and operate clean energy projects including solar PV, wind power and battery storage.
data.text:
Bringing clean energy to life

Aquila Clean Energy Asia Pacific is an energy platform that funds, develops and operates clean energy assets including solar PV, wind and battery storage. Through developing and managing clean energy assets, we are committed to advancing the energy transition towards a more sustainable future.

Since launching our APAC arm of the business in 2020, we have acquired a significant portfolio of development projects and our vision is to build one of the leading clean energy platforms in the region.

A rich history in sustainable investments

Aquila Clean Energy is part of Aquila Group, a sustainable investment and asset development company that specialises in generating and managing essential assets. The company has a wind, solar PV and hydropower portfolio of 19.8 GW and manages EUR 14.6 billion on behalf of institutional investors worldwide. Aquila Group’s mission is to become one of the world’s leading sustainable investment and development companies for essential assets by 2030. To show commitment to this mission, Aquila Group has set a goal to avoid 1.5 bn tonnes of CO2e by 2035 across its portfolio’s lifetime. Aquila Group is headquartered in Hamburg, Germany.

as of 31.12.2023
